DOC.brief_summary: This randomize clinical trial test effect computerize ( web-based ) cognitive training intervention smoke cessation . All participant receive 8 week standard nicotine patch therapy , smoke cessation counseling , randomize 1 2 different train program : cognitive training vs. control training .
DOC.criteria: Inclusion : 1 . Healthy male female treatmentseeking smoker 18 65 year age selfreport smoke least 5 cigarette ( menthol and/or nonmenthol ) per day least last 6 month 2 . Plan live area least next 8 month 3 . Capable give write informed consent , include compliance requirement restriction list combined consent HIPAA form 4 . Able communicate fluently English ( speak , write , read ) 5 . Have uninterrupted access home computer sound capability , keyboard , mouse , active Internet connection 6 . Provide Carbon Monoxide ( CO ) breath test reading great equal 8 part per million ( ppm ) Intake Visit
